title: Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Turn off Vertex AI Search and Conversation
abstract:
# Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Turn off Vertex AI Search and Conversation
Turning off Vertex AI Search and Conversation stops billing, and there is no guarantee that your data related to it will persist. If you delete the project, then all data is deleted according to the deletion policy for projects.
Vertex AI Search and Conversation is based on the Discovery Engine API.
To turn off Vertex AI Search and Conversation, follow these steps:
- In the Google Cloud console, go to the [Discovery Engine API Service Details](https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/api/discoveryengine.googleapis.com) page.
- Click **Disable API** .
- In the **Disable Discovery Engine API?** box, click **Disable**
